sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(A.PAY_CNT) +1, 0) AS MAX_PAY_CNT FROM TX2211_TB A WHERE A.TAX_NO = #TAX_NO#

SELECT NVL(MAX(A.PAY_CNT)+1, 0) AS MAX_PAY_CNT FROM TX2221_TB A, TX2121_VW_OCR B WHERE A.SGG_COD = B.SGG_COD AND A.ACCT_COD = B.ACCT_COD AND A.TAX_ITEM = B.TAX_ITEM AND A.TAX_YY = B.TAX_YY AND A.TAX_MM = B.TAX_MM AND A.TAX_DIV = B.TAX_DIV AND A.HACD = B.HACD AND A.TAX_SNO = B.TAX_SNO AND A.TAX_CNT = B.TAX_CNT AND B.EPAY_NO IS NOT NULL /*전자납부번호*/
RPAD(B.EPAY_NO,19,'0') = RPAD(#EPAY_NO#,19,'0') /*전자납부번호 */
B.OCR_BD LIKE #TAX_NO#||'%' /*납세번호 */

SELECT RPAD(EPAY_NO,19,'0') EPAY_NO /* 전자납부번호 */ , TAX_ITEM /* 과세목코드 */ , TAX_YM /* 부과년월 */ , TAX_NO /* 납부번호 */ , FC_DAMO(REG_NO) REG_NO , OCR_BD , DUE_DT , F_GET_GYMD(NVL(DUE_F_DT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd'))) DUE_F_DT , PAYMENT_DATE1 AMT /* 납기내금액 */ , PAYMENT_DATE1 + NVL(AFTPAYMENT_DATE1, 0) AFTAMT /* 납기후금액 */ , TAX_CNT , '1' TAX_GBN FROM TX2111_VW_OCR WHERE EPAY_NO IS NOT NULL /*전자납부번호는 무조건 있어야된다. */
AND SNTG IN ('0', '9') /*납부상태 미수납 및 취소*/ AND F_GET_GYMD(DUE_F_DT) >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /*납부가능한 것만...*/ /*조건 전자수납번호, 납세번호*/
RPAD(EPAY_NO,19,'0') = RPAD(#EPAY_NO#,19,'0') /*전자납부번호 */
TAX_NO = #TAX_NO# /*납세번호 */
UNION ALL
/*특별회계에 해당 1.주거지전용주차료, 2.버스전용주차료*/
SELECT RPAD(A.EPAY_NO,19,'0') EPAY_NO , A.TAX_ITEM , A.TAX_YY || A.TAX_MM TAX_YM , SUBSTR(A.OCR_BD, 3, 29)||'000' TAX_NO , FC_DAMO(A.REG_NO) REG_NO , A.OCR_BD , A.DUE_DT , F_GET_GYMD(NVL(A.DUE_F_DT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd'))) DUE_F_DT , A.BUTT AMT , A.BUTT + A.GAMONEY AFTAMT , A.TAX_CNT , '2' TAX_GBN FROM TX2121_VW_OCR A, CO3301_TB B /*구세외수입 TBL, 세목코드 TBL*/ WHERE A.EPAY_NO IS NOT NULL /*전자납부번호는 무조건 있어야된다.*/ AND A.SNTG IN ('0', '9') /*납부상태 미수납 및 취소*/ AND F_GET_GYMD(A.DUE_F_DT) >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') /*납부가능한 것만...*/ AND A.TAX_ITEM = B.TAX_ITEM
/* 전자납부번호 */
RPAD(A.EPAY_NO,19,'0') = RPAD(#EPAY_NO#,19,'0') /*전자납부번호 */
A.OCR_BD LIKE #TAX_NO#||'%' /*납세번호 */
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TX2211_TB( /*표준세외수입 전자수납*/ TAX_NO ,TAX_CNT ,PAY_CNT ,SUM_RCP ,PAY_DT ,SNTG ,SNSU ,BANK_CD ,OCR_BD ,TRTG ,BRC_NO ,TMSG_NO ,RSN_YN ) VALUES( #TAX_NO# ,#TAX_CNT# ,#PAY_CNT# ,#SUM_RCP# ,#PAY_DT# ,#SNTG# ,#SNSU# ,#BANK_CD# ,#OCR_BD# ,#TRTG# ,#BRC_NO# ,#TMSG_NO# ,#RSN_YN# )

INSERT INTO TX2221_TB( /*구세외수입 전자수납*/ SGG_COD ,ACCT_COD ,TAX_ITEM ,TAX_YY ,TAX_MM ,TAX_DIV ,HACD ,TAX_SNO ,TAX_CNT ,PAY_CNT ,SUM_RCP ,PAY_DT ,SNTG ,SNSU ,BANK_CD ,BRC_NO ,TMSG_NO ,OCR_BD ,TRTG ,RSN_YN ,LAST_DTM) SELECT SGG_COD ,ACCT_COD ,TAX_ITEM ,TAX_YY ,TAX_MM ,TAX_DIV ,HACD ,TAX_SNO ,TAX_CNT ,#PAY_CNT# ,#SUM_RCP# ,#PAY_DT# ,#SNTG# ,#SNSU# ,#BANK_CD# ,#BRC_NO# ,#TMSG_NO# ,OCR_BD ,#TRTG# ,#RSN_YN# ,SYSDATE FROM TX2121_VW_OCR WHERE EPAY_NO IS NOT NULL AND SNTG IN ('0', '9') AND SGG_COD = #SGG_COD# AND ACCT_COD = #ACCT_COD# AND TAX_ITEM = #TAX_ITEM# AND TAX_YY = #TAX_YY# AND TAX_MM = #TAX_MM# AND TAX_DIV = #TAX_DIV# AND HACD = #HACD# AND TAX_SNO = #TAX_SNO#
RPAD(EPAY_NO,19,'0') = RPAD(#EPAY_NO#,19,'0') /*전자납부번호 */

SELECT A.TAX_NO TAX_NO , A.SNTG SNTG , '1' TAX_GBN FROM TX2211_TB A, TX2111_VW_OCR B WHERE A.TAX_NO = B.TAX_NO AND B.EPAY_NO IS NOT NULL /*전자납부번호*/ AND B.SNTG IN ('1', '2', '9') /*납부 1:가수납 2: 수납 9:취소*/ AND B.EPAY_NO = #EPAY_NO# AND B.TAX_NO = #TAX_NO#
UNION ALL
SELECT SUBSTR(B.OCR_BD, 1, 31) TAX_NO , A.SNTG SNTG , '2' TAX_GBN FROM TX2221_TB A, TX2121_VW_OCR B WHERE A.SGG_COD = B.SGG_COD AND A.ACCT_COD = B.ACCT_COD AND A.TAX_ITEM = B.TAX_ITEM AND A.TAX_YY = B.TAX_YY AND A.TAX_MM = B.TAX_MM AND A.TAX_DIV = B.TAX_DIV AND A.HACD = B.HACD AND A.TAX_SNO = B.TAX_SNO AND A.TAX_CNT = B.TAX_CNT AND B.EPAY_NO IS NOT NULL /*전자납부번호*/ AND B.SNTG IN ('1', '2', '9') /*납부 1:가수납 2: 수납 9:취소*/ AND RPAD(B.EPAY_NO,19,'0') = RPAD(#EPAY_NO#,19,'0') /*전자납부번호 */ AND B.OCR_BD LIKE #TAX_NO#||'%'
